scripts.checkly:test: node scripts/load-env-and-run.js "npx cross-env CHECKLY_API_KEY=$CHECKLY_API_KEY CHECKLY_ACCOUNT_ID=$CHECKLY_ACCOUNT_ID npx checkly test"
scripts.checkly:test:record: node scripts/load-env-and-run.js "npx cross-env CHECKLY_API_KEY=$CHECKLY_API_KEY CHECKLY_ACCOUNT_ID=$CHECKLY_ACCOUNT_ID npx checkly test --record"
scripts.checkly:list: node scripts/load-env-and-run.js "npx cross-env CHECKLY_API_KEY=$CHECKLY_API_KEY CHECKLY_ACCOUNT_ID=$CHECKLY_ACCOUNT_ID npx checkly test --list"
